description: Women post selfies demanding more representation in official bodies dealing with Covid-19.
title: Dateci Voce: Italian women demand voice in Covid-19 fight
title_page: Dateci Voce: Italian women demand voice in Covid-19 fight - BBC News
maintext: Italy ranks 35th globally in female representation in parliament, according to the Inter Parliamentary Union - ahead of the UK (40) and the US (81). However, it still has one of the lowest numbers of working women in Europe and all of the country's 58 prime ministers since unification have been men.
